Package com.regularvendingmachine

Class RegularVendingMachine

java.lang.Object
com.regularvendingmachine.RegularVendingMachine
public class RegularVendingMachine extends Object
This is RegularVendingMachine class which represents the regular vending machine object of the machine

      public void purchaseItem(int nItemIndex, int nItemQuantity)
      Enables the user to purchase availabale items in the vending machine as well as updates the nec
      Parameters:
      nItemIndex - represents the index of an item
      nItemQuantity - represents the quatity of an item

    • findItem

      public boolean findItem(String name)
      Finds an item within the vendingSlot
      Parameters:
      name - represents the name of a new item
      Returns:
      true if the item was found and false otherwise

    • insertPayment

      public boolean insertPayment(int nAmount)
      Receives money from the user by inserting the accepted amount/s(denominations)
      Parameters:
      nAmount - represents the money to be inserted by the user
      Returns:
      true if the value inserted is equal to any of the following amount: 0, 1, 5, 10, 20, 50, 100, and 200 and false otherwise

    • displayTransactions

      public void displayTransactions()
      Shows the transaction/s made by the user which includes the item name and its quantity

    • displayToPurchase

      public void displayToPurchase(int nItemIndex, int nItemQuantity)
      Displays the information of the item to be purchased which includes its name, price, and quantity
      Parameters:
      nItemIndex - represents the index of an item
      nItemQuantity - represents the quantity of an item

    • calculateChange

      public int calculateChange(int nPayment, int nItemIndex, int nItemQuantity)
      Calculates the change to be returned to the user after a purchase, keeps track of the number of each denomination used, and prints the breakdown of the change. The method then returns the initial change amount
      Parameters:
      nPayment - represents the amount paid by the user
      nItemIndex - represents the index of an item
      nItemQuantity - represents the quantity of an item
      Returns:
      nFullChange represents the amount of money left of the user

    • replenishChange

      public void replenishChange(int nAmount)
      Replenishes the change in the vending machine by adding the specified nAmount to the vendingMoney object, which manages the money in the machine
      Parameters:
      nAmount - represents the value to be added to the vending money

    • getEarnings

      public void getEarnings()
      Returns the values stored which is the earnings accumulated by the vending machine in the vendingSlot variable

    • getVendingSlot

      public ArrayList<ItemSlot> getVendingSlot()
      Returns the values stored in the vendingSlot variable
      Returns:
      this.vendingSlot represents the arraylist of the vending slot stored

    • getMoneyBox

      public MoneyBox getMoneyBox()
      Returns the values stored in the vendingMoney variable
      Returns:
      this.vendingMoney represents the vending money stored
